allow: Bash(python -c "from test_case_generator.agents import VerificationAgent; from test_case_generator.main import TestCaseGenerator; from test_case_generator.models.schemas import TestCase; print\(''All imports successful!''\); tc = TestCase\(id=''TEST-001'', title=''Test'', module_id=1, module_title=''Test'', workflow=''Test'', test_type=''positive'', priority=''High'', preconditions=''None''\); print\(f''TestCase fields: {list\(tc.__dict__.keys\(\)\)}''\)")

Bash(python -c "
from test_case_generator.agents.verification_agent import VerificationAgent
from test_case_generator.models.schemas import ParsedFunctionalDescription, ParsedModule, TestCase

# Test that we can create the agent
agent = VerificationAgent\(api_key=''test'', model=''test''\)
print\(f''✓ VerificationAgent created''\)
print\(f''  - State categories \(empty initially\): {agent.state_categories}''\)
print\(f''  - Has extract_state_categories method: {hasattr\(agent, ""extract_state_categories""\)}''\)

# Create a test case
tc = TestCase\(
    id=''TEST-001'',
    title=''Test transfer'',
    module_id=1,
    module_title=''Transfer'',
    workflow=''Transfer funds'',
    test_type=''positive'',
    priority=''High'',
    preconditions=''None''
\)
print\(f''✓ TestCase created with verification fields''\)
print\(f''  - reads_state: {tc.reads_state}''\)
print\(f''  - writes_state: {tc.writes_state}''\)
print\(f''  - verification_test_ids: {tc.verification_test_ids}''\)
print\(''\\n✓ All imports and objects working correctly!''\)
")
